name: Hive Infestation
description:
Hive Infestation is a 2D platformer shooter with a Sci-Fi space theme. Explore your surroundings whilst killing aliens and uncovering secrets. The game contains several different enemies and a variety of environments to explore.

Are you ready to enter the Hive?
 


 
Hive Infestation was made as a student project by five 1st year university students during the course of 6 weeks.
 

 
Controls
A/D - Movement
Space - Jump
Mouse - Aim
LMB - Shoot
Tab - Toggle ship log screen
